name: duodecillion
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a number written as 1 followed by 39 zeros: Here's a list of number names up to and including a duodecillion. This internet protocol can support over 3 duodecillion internet addresses.
UK old-fashioned a number written as 1 followed by 72 zeros
More examplesFewer examplesA duodecillion can be described as 10 to the 39th power.Even if a person keeps saving for the rest of his life, he will never accumulate a duodecillion pounds.The teacher challenged them to write down a duodecillion in figures.
